data.title: YA Books WITHOUT Romance! - King County Library System
data.meta_description:
YA Books WITHOUT Romance! by amlegaspi - a community-created list : Believe it or not, there are some great Teen or YA books out there that do not have romance in them! The books listed below are certified romance-free. However, they may still contain violence, foul language, or other gritty subject matter. These books are all geared towards teenagers and young adults, although they may be enjoyed by all.

Note: Some of the books on this list are the first books of series. In those cases, only the first book has been evaluated and I cannot guarantee that there is no romance in the rest of the series!

Amal is an Australian Muslim teenager who faces identity and self-acceptance issues when she makes the decision to wear the hijab full time. Amal is an Australian Muslim teenager who faces identity and self-acceptance issues when she makes the decision to wear the hijab full time. Show less
